presentation.preview: My name is Carlos Neto, I'm a Full-Stack Junior Software Developer mainly working with C# and React. I also play the guitar and paint some frames as a hobby. Down below I have a timeline with my current experience.

dgav.candidaturas: Platform developed with Blazor App, .NET 8.0, SQL Server and Git for version control and development. This project was developed to automate a manual process made by hand with forms.
dgav.jurista-mobile: Application developed for law workspace for DGAV, with the goal to automate a process state update and its validation, developed using React Native and Git for version control.

ninja.description: At my last year in high school I did an internship by Erasmus, a european program that gives really good opportunities to students. I went to Berlim, Germany and work for a company called NinjaRMM, by the end of my internship it changed to NinjaOne. I worked for the marketing team collecting emails and phone numbers with webscrape and APIs. They needed a programmer because they had about 15 thousand leads to collect, which can not be done one by one. In the marketing workspace, they did not know much about programming so I had to choose the best way to solve their problem on my own.
activities: Creation of a email signature generator with HTML, CSS, JS
Collecting leads data with APIs using Python

listo.description: Listo S.A is a brazilian company that works with payment machines, I did not work for the development team that work on the SaaS, I was in the infrastructure team helping with the equipment invetory, computer problems and configuration.
activities: Development of Excel tables using VBA

description-myself.title: A little about myself
description-myself.description: I'm a Full-Stack Junior Software Developer, born in March 17, 2004, I have interest in system development since I was 15 years old, and I have experience in the following technologies:

front-end: Knowladge of HTML, CSS and JS <subtle>(medium)</subtle>
Mobile apps with React Native or Expo <subtle>(low)</subtle> - <link>https://github.com/Saraivinha1703/expo-graphql</link>
Website development with ASP.NET Core 8.0 using Blazor App and Razor pages <subtle>(low)</subtle>
Web development with ASP.NET using Web Forms <subtle>(very low)</subtle>
Web development with ASP.NET using MVC <subtle>(very low)</subtle>
Experience with package managers like yarn, pnpm and npm <subtle>(medium)</subtle>
back-end: GraphQL with ASP.NET Core using Hot Chocolate <subtle>(very low)</subtle>
Experience with relational database SQL Server <subtle>(low)</subtle>
AI chat with Next.js, OpenAI, Hugging Face Inference and Together AI using Typescript in a Next.js project <subtle>(medium)</subtle> - <link>https://github.com/Saraivinha1703/nextjs-ai-chat</link>
generic: Git for project development and version control <subtle>(medium)</subtle>

description-myself.knowladge-levels: Experience levels: very low - low - medium - high - very high
